alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin; Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:07PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hennepin, Scott and central Carver Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1107 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mayer, or 19 miles south of Buffalo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waconia and St. Bonifacius around 1120 PM CDT. Mound and Minnetrista around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chaska, Chanhassen, Orono, Victoria, Carver, Wayzata, Excelsior, Eden Prairie, Minnetonka, St. Louis Park, Shakopee, Savage, Burnsville, Edina, MSP International Airport, Bloomington and Richfield. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 76 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central Minnesota.
